alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 8:49AM MST until January 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one half mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...Quay County and Eastern San Miguel County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog remains across portions of the area, with temperatures near freezing. Slick spots on roads and especially bridges and overpasses will continue for a couple more hours. This includes portions of Interstate 40.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Quay County
